title: President expresses condolence with Pir Qadri
content:
ISLAMABAD, June 30 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi Wednesday visited the residence of Minister for Religious Affairs Pir Noor ul Haq Qadri to express his condolence on the sad demise of his sister.
The president offered Fateha and expressed his deep grief and sorrow over the death of ministerâ€™s sister.
The president also prayed for the departed soul and for the family to bear the loss with equanimity.
